key.name: delay
key.description: The number of seconds to wait before taking the screenshot.

key.name: last-save-directory
key.description: The directory the last screenshot was saved in.

key.name: include-border
key.description: Include the window manager border along with the screenshot

key.name: include-pointer
key.description: Include the pointer in the screenshot

key.name: border-effect
key.description: Effect to add to the outside of a border. Possible values are "shadow", "none", and "border".
